original_text: The Israelites joined the Moabite women to worship their god, Baal of Peor. So the Lord became very angry with them.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 바알브올에게 가담한지라 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하시니라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites joined the Moabite women
to worship their god, Baal of Peor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 신인 브올 바알을 경배하기 위해

sentences.original_text: So the Lord became very angry with them
